data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Rum Cay, Bahamas that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rum Cay, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Rum Cay, Bahamas to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 100 citizens of Rum Cay, Bahamas, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Rum Cay.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Rum Cay, Bahamas.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Rum Cay.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Rum Cay, Bahamas that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rum Cay, Bahamas has a population of 100.

We estimate Rum Cay has 40 people who might know Jesus, 55 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
